text:
Christine Maria Verburg (25 February 1956 - 13 June 2020) was a Dutch television presenter and journalist. She was known for the magazine programme "TROS Aktua". Verburg started her career in 1979. She was an announcer with TROS and became presenter of TROS Aktua in 1984. Later she also presented the game show TROS Triviant.
Verburg died after a long-illness on 13 June 2020, aged 64.
